pkgmetadata.longdescription: # py-canary [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/snjoetw/py-canary.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/snjoetw/py-canary)Python API for Canary Security Camera. This is used in [Home Assistant](https://home-assistant.io) but should be generic enough that can be used elsewhere.
